pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, May 10, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, May 10, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the University Presidents of the U15 Group of Canadian Research Universities.

Room 340-S
Centre Block, Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
